docs.lead_paragraph: The following table shows the names of ships, the lines operating them, their destination, when their regular and supplementary mails close at General Postoffice and City Hall station (regular mails close at Brooklyn General Postoffice one hour earlier and at the Morgan Annex one-half hour later), when they sail, location of piers and points for which they carry mail.

docs.snippet: One of the most elaborate radio hook-ups in the history of broadcasting enabled many millions of listeners, not only in the United States but in other parts of the civilized world, to hear President Roosevelt take the oath of office.

docs.snippet: With only four games remaining on the schedule, Brazil and Argentina today were undefeated in the South American soccer football championship tournament. Brazil has scored four straight victories, and Argentina three. Paraguay is in third place with...
docs.lead_paragraph: With only four games remaining on the schedule, Brazil and Argentina today were undefeated in the South American soccer football championship tournament. Brazil has scored four straight victories, and Argentina three. Paraguay is in third place with two games won and two lost, Chile and Uruguay fourth with one victory
